1.title: Echoes of Tomorrow
1.description: A sci-fi short film exploring the consequences of time travel. When a young scientist discovers a way to send messages to the past, she inadvertently unravels the fabric of her own existence.

2.title: Crimson Peak
2.description: A visually rich music video for the indie band "The Wanderers". The video tells a gothic horror story set in a desolate, abandoned mansion, mirroring the song's haunting lyrics.

3.title: Momentum
3.description: A high-energy commercial for a new electric sports car. We used cutting-edge FPV drones and high-speed cameras to capture the vehicle's power and agility.

4.title: The Wild Within
4.description: A feature documentary following a team of conservationists as they track and protect endangered species in the Amazon rainforest. A story of hope, struggle, and the future of our planet.

5.title: Starlight
5.tagline: A love written in the stars.
5.description: A romantic drama about two astronomers who fall in love while on the verge of a groundbreaking discovery. Their personal and professional lives collide as they face an impossible choice.

6.title: The Artisan
6.description: A short brand film for a luxury watchmaker, focusing on the meticulous craftsmanship and dedication that goes into every single timepiece.

showreels.title: STRUGGLES OF HOUSE MANAGERS
showreels.description: A short documentary film exploring the daily struggles faced by house managers.
